rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: State officials have quarantined the Kalamazoo County site and the 34 birds at that property will be depopulated to prevent the spread of disease, the USDA said, noting that birds from that flock will not enter the food system.
